Author: altoristics
Text: what you’re describing is a really common thought among people who have experienced things like this, but this is not your fault in any way, this is a literal adult taking advantage of you. do you have a trusted friend/sibling/councillor you could talk to? sometimes it can feel like you want to just bottle it up or pretend it never happened, but talking to someone is much better for your mental health ❤️

Author: yalltripping
Text: Sweetie, it's not your fault, and I'm so sorry. I was in your shoes when I was 17. Do you have anyone you can talk to about what happened? A school counsellor maybe? It's really important that you talk through your feelings about it. I wouldn't recommend being around them again, they sound like they were intentionally setting you up to be vulnerable. ❤️
